column7: Designed for students who wish to do advanced readings and research in greater depth and to investigate further ideas and themes that have been explored in EPOL 199 and EPOL 201. Same as EPS 395. Prerequisite: EPOL 201; and consent of adviser and staff member who supervises the work.
column9: Same as EPS 395. Prerequisite: EPOL 201; and consent of adviser and staff member who supervises the work.
